name: Chicken Attack (itch) (Event Horizon School)
description:
Defend your farm from the evil hens that will attack you when the day turns into night! Stop them from destroying all your buildings and discover the various weapons from round to round. 

P.S. The chickens are very cute.

The goal of the player is to defend the buildings of the farm from the chicken that will turn into zombies and attack at night. The game is divided into various rounds, from round to round you will find weapons,medkits and bullets in some areas of the map. The player will have to hold out for as many rounds as possible while continuing to hunt the chickens.
